name: Marie
title: Lovely Bomber
acquisition_text:
Anything is possible through alchemy.
Shall we find out what we can accomplish together?

profile.voice_text: I'm Marlone from Salburg Academy. I hope my alchemy can be of some assistance.
profile.description: An energetic, tomboyish alchemist who studied alchemy at the academy in a certain town. She now travels across the regions of Lantarna in search of the truth of alchemy. While she is bright and friendly, she can be lazy and a little careless at times. Her tendency to solve problems with bombs has also earned her a reputation as a bomb enthusiast.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg

You're startin' to cheese me off.

A passionate chef.
He is in charge of the kitchen at a cafe in the royal capital. His favorite frying pan, which he uses for cooking, at times doubles as a weapon against monsters.
He often accompanied his childhood friend, the alchemist Rorona, on her gathering expeditions, helping her out whenever she messed things up. He has a mature disposition but hates to lose and can become heated in competitions.

profile.description: A gentle alchemist with a soothing touch. In preparation for the upcoming battle against the Polar Night Alchemists, she has joined the medical team that prepares restorative medicines. This outfit was a gift from Roman to help her perform her duties more comfortably. Despite her calm and relaxed demeanor, she has the courage to dive into dangerous places to gather ingredients for her medicine.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Ayesha ~The Alchemist of Dusk~

She is particularly fond of this outfit, which allows her to blend perfectly into the darkness—ideal for a witch.

She likes to study and has a good understanding of the world around her, but her artistic sensibilities are questionable at best.

name: Valeria
title: Dreamer of the Past
acquisition_text:
Leave the fighting to me.
I'm confident in what I can do.

profile.voice_text: I'm Valeria. I don't remember my past... But that doesn't stop me from enjoying myself.
profile.description:
A warrior with amnesia. Relying on her excellent fighting skills, she and Heidi tend to take on a variety of rough jobs. With no memory of her past, she spends her days trying to figure out who she really is.
She has a strong and outspoken personality, but is surprisingly weak when pressured by others.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator

acquisition_text:
I'm still not sure who I am...
but I'm starting to understand what I need to do!

profile.voice_text: I'm Valeria. I don't like delicate work, but leave the monsters to me.
profile.description: A warrior who is as strong as she is beautiful. She loves nothing more than being right in the thick of battle. Her clothing takes most of the beating, but her roommate Flocke always patches it up for her. If Valeria takes her jacket off, though, she means business. While that increases her odds of being injured, she believes in wrapping fights up before that happens.

acquisition_text: I will win! No matter who stands against me!

profile.voice_text: I'll do everything in my power to keep this land—the place my family, Resna, and the others call home—safe from the Apexi.
profile.description: A warrior shrouded in layers of mystery. Despite losing her memories, she lives each day to the fullest, blessed with many chance encounters, starting with meeting her partner, Heidi. In the current battle, she uses her formidable strength to protect her precious friends. While she looks stunning in her elegant attire, she doesn't much care for the appearance itself. She is simply satisfied with its performance.

name: Valeria
title: Radiant Summer
acquisition_text: Come on, let's go swimming! I'll take care of any enemies lurking in the water!

profile.voice_text: I'm a great swimmer! Leave any battles in the water to me! I can adapt to almost any situation!
profile.description: A beautiful warrior with amnesia. She didn't see the need for a swimsuit, but still captivated everyone with how great it looked on her. Once she tried it on, she found it very light and easy to move in, which was perfect for her as she believes that striking first is the key to victory.

Come, kindred spirit! We shall charge

I'm Roman Kalman, just a humble adventurer.
Totally trustworthy, I assure you! Hahaha.

With a dream of restoring alchemy to its former glory, he warmly refers to Resna, who shares his vision, as his "kindred spirit." His buoyant spirit masks a competent adventurer who is adept at handling whatever comes his way.

My name is Juna, a servant of the royal palace and a Knight of the Midnight Sun.
Should you require my aid, I am ever at your service.

One of the Knights of the Midnight Sun, a subset of the Royal Knights entrusted with critical duties such as guarding the royal family and eliminating dangerous monsters.
Renowned in Lantarna as the Dragon Slayer, her adventures have become something of a legend.
She presents a stoic front, speaking little, but she is a compassionate soul dedicated to the cause of the people.

Guided by her belief in the path they have chosen, she eagerly joins their quest to take down the Apexi.

Resourceful and adept, she gathers information while also playing the role of the bride. However, she was initially embarrassed by the outfit and was constantly teased by Valeria and Lanze, so it took her a while to get used to it.

profile.voice_text: I'm Heidi! I may not be the best at fighting, but with my partner by my side, we're unstoppable!
profile.description: Valeria's upbeat partner. She ran away from one thing after another until she ended up in the capital, where she met Valeria and the others. Although she's not skilled in direct combat, she's quick on her feet and provides tactical support as Valeria's trusty partner. While her attempts to make a quick profit don't always work out, she tends to be blessed with good luck when it matters most.

Though usually reserved, once she has made up her mind, she always sees her choice through with determination.

Having experienced the joy of being helped when she needed it, she now strives to lend a hand to anyone else in need.

acquisition_text: All aboard! Time to put my newly trained fists to the test!

profile.voice_text: I'm a sailor who lost it all. But I won't lose heart again. I'll stay strong for my crew!
profile.description: A once-renowned sailor from the northern seas of the kingdom. His ship was attacked by an Apexi, resulting in the loss of his wife and crew. Since then, he has been drowning his sorrows in alcohol. However, thanks to the companions he met in the capital, he was inspired to pursue his dream of reaching the World's End once again.

I will become the strongest knight!
I swear upon a shooting star!

profile.voice_text:
My dream is to be the strongest knight ever!
I'll protect everyone with this hammer!
profile.description:
A bright and cheerful beastgirl, and Resna's best friend.
Ever since she was a child, she has admired knights.
She and Resna made a pact to fulfill their dreams together and often encourage each other along the way.
Influenced by her father, a blacksmith, she wields a giant hammer as her weapon.
She has a bit of an obsession with hammers.

profile.voice_text: I'm usually running around with a hammer, so wearing something this pretty makes me nervous!

Although she is brave, she also has a feminine side and couldn't stop admiring herself in the mirror after changing into this outfit. She has no plans to get married anytime soon, but seeing her in this outfit brought tears to her father's eyes, and she found it difficult to comfort him.

acquisition_text: I'm said to have the power of a genius—and this time I'll let you use that power for once!

profile.voice_text: This is where I belong now. You can trust this genius to keep everything here safe.
profile.description: A young girl who served as an enforcer under the code name Crow in the Moonlight Society, an organization unrecognized by the kingdom. She has lived her life obeying nothing but the words of the organization's leader, Oliver, who is also her only family—her grandfather. She is very confident in her fighting skills, and her prowess in combat is undeniable. She has a strong sense of pride, hates to lose, and can be headstrong, often rushing into situations on her own.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator

skill_2.name: Phantom Mirror Slash
skill_2.description:
After attacking, boosts target's physical attack damage received by {0}% for 2 attacks.
Phantom Mirror Slash has charge indicators, and once 3 indicators are charged, the skill effect changes.
There are a maximum of 3 charges.

When there are less than 3 charges, after attacking, charges 1 of the indicators.

When there are 3 charges, after attacking, grants self Evasion ({1}% chance) for 1 attack, boosts own P. ATK and SPD by {2}% for 2 turns, and removes all charges from this skill.

When there are less than 3 charges, after attack, charges 1 of the indicators.
When there are 3 charges, after attack, grants self Evasion, boosts own stats, and removes all charges.

passive_2.description: Boosts skill damage by 0–100% depending on own SPD. (Higher boost for higher SPD, range: 280–520 SPD)

effects.description: [自身/素早さの値に応じ/スキルダメージアップ]

name: Geron
title: Beastly Fencer
acquisition_text: I owe you all a great debt. Feel free to make use of my skills.

profile.voice_text: I am Geron Diezel, an alchemist. I wield this sword for the sake of our future.
profile.description: An alchemist whose body has been partially transformed into that of a beast. He has no qualms about using his strength to force others into submission, so long as it helps fulfill his desires. Though he doesn't talk much, he changes when it comes to his younger brother, his only family. As an older brother, he's surprisingly caring and responsible, but when it comes to dealing with women, he's rather hopeless.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator

name: Lara
title: Queen's Grace
acquisition_text: This path seems as if it will prove most entertaining. Time for me to add a new chapter to my story.

profile.voice_text: I am Lara Trockel. A proud queen who will be the foundation upon which unfulfilled souls stand.
profile.description: An alchemist with the appearance of nobility. She uses alchemy in her ambition to establish the Kingdom of Lara, putting her at odds with Resna, who believes alchemy should be used to bring happiness to others. As a self-proclaimed leader, she is meticulous about maintaining an air of elegance in her appearance, which she believes is appropriate for a queen who leads others.
profile.origin_game: Atelier Resleriana: Forgotten Alchemy and the Polar Night Liberator

acquisition_text: I swore that I would wield this sword to protect everyone!

profile.voice_text: I enrolled here at Lantarna Academy for personal reasons. Will I...fit in here?
profile.description: A new alchemy student at Lantarna Academy. She enrolled at the academy via recommendation, but she rarely attends class and doesn't seem to have joined the alchemy club. She's taciturn and rarely mingles with her classmates, instead preferring to be a lone wolf.
